messages.title: Thank You says Jackie
messages.content: Jackie Porter and the Liberal Democrats would like to thank local voters for their support in the recent County Council elections.

messages.title: Conservatives failing our schools
messages.content: A new report from the National Union of Teachers shows that Winchester’s schools get one of the worst funding deals in the country.

messages.title: NHS ransomware attack linked to cuts
messages.content: The computer virus which has affected hospital trusts including the Hampshire Hospitals trust which runs Winchester’s hospital can be clearly linked to Governments attempts to save money.

messages.title: Unemployment to rise as Brexit takes its toll
messages.content: Brexit is already hitting the economy, risking millions of jobs and hitting the pockets of our families.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Fight education funding cuts with £7bn for schools, ensuring schools are not underfunded.

The Liberal Democrats' plan for a 1p tax increase to put an extra £6bn into the NHS has been welcomed by former health service chiefs as a realistic way of providing the funding needed to maintain services.
The Liberal Democrats would give people the final say on any Brexit deal and will oppose the hardest of hard Brexits.

mentions.tacticalSituation: With your support on June 8th we will win the Winchester constituency and be the strong opposition the Country needs.

issues.brexitEurope: Brexit is already hitting the economy...
issues.economy: Unemployment to rise as Brexit takes its toll...
issues.education: A new report from the National Union of Teachers shows that Winchester’s schools get one of the worst funding deals in the country.
issues.health: NHS cuts are a ticking time bomb.

politicalExperience.achievements: The Liberal Democrats won 4 of the 7 divisions in the constituency.

images.caption: Hundreds of people across Winchester & Chandler's Ford have joined the Liberal Democrats and are backing Jackie Porter's campaign.
